AVReceiver.description: AVReceiver object to control network amplifier

parameters.description: Port to use for connection
parameters.name: port

parameters.description: AVReceiver model. Supported: pioneer, denon, onkyo, marantz, yamaha
parameters.name: model

parameters.description: Internal graphical type for all calaos objects. Set automatically, read-only parameter.
parameters.name: gui_type

parameters.description: Unique ID identifying the Input/Output in calaos-server
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Name of Input/Output.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Display the Input/Output on all user interfaces if set. Default to true
parameters.name: visible

parameters.description: Zone of the amplifier (if supported)
parameters.name: zone

parameters.description: IP address of the device
parameters.name: host

parameters.description: Enable the Input/Output. The default value is true. This parameter is added if it's not found in the configuration.
parameters.name: enabled

actions.description: Send a custom command to receiver (if you know the protocol)
actions.name: custom XXXXXX

actions.description: Switch receiver on
actions.name: power on

actions.description: Change current input source
actions.name: source X

actions.description: Switch receiver off
actions.name: power off

actions.description: Set current volume
actions.name: volume 50

BlinkstickOutputLightRGB.description: RGB light. Choose a color to be set for this light.

parameters.description: Internal graphical type for all calaos objects. Set automatically, read-only parameter.
parameters.name: gui_type

parameters.description: Unique ID identifying the Input/Output in calaos-server
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Name of Input/Output.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Display the Input/Output on all user interfaces if set. Default to true
parameters.name: visible

parameters.description: Enable the Input/Output. The default value is true. This parameter is added if it's not found in the configuration.
parameters.name: enabled

conditions.description: Event when light is at this value
conditions.name: value

conditions.description: Event on any change of value
conditions.name: changed

actions.description: Decrease intensity by X percent of green channel
actions.name: down_green 5

actions.description: Decrease intensity by X percent of red channel
actions.name: down_red 5

actions.description: Invert the light state (ON/OFF)
actions.name: toggle

actions.description: Switch the light off
actions.name: false

actions.description: Update internal light state without starting real action. This is useful when having updating the light state from an external source.
actions.name: set_state #AA1294

actions.description: Decrease intensity by X percent of blue channel
actions.name: down_blue 5

actions.description: Increase intensity by X percent of red channel
actions.name: up_red 5

actions.description: Update internal light state without starting real action. This is useful when having updating the light state from an external source.
actions.name: set_state true

actions.description: Increase intensity by X percent of green channel
actions.name: up_green 5

actions.description: Set green channel to X percent
actions.name: set_green 50

actions.description: Increase intensity by X percent of blue channel
actions.name: up_blue 5

actions.description: Switch the light on
actions.name: true

actions.description: Update internal light state without starting real action. This is useful when having updating the light state from an external source.
actions.name: set_state false

actions.description: Set color. Color can be represented by using HTML notation: #AABBCC, rgb(50, 10, 30), hsl(11, 22, 33)
actions.name: set #AA1294

actions.description: Set blue channel to X percent
actions.name: set_blue 50

actions.description: Set red channel to X percent
actions.name: set_red 50

GpioOutputShutter.description: Simple shutter. This shutter supports open/close states, as well as impulse shutters.

parameters.description: Impulse time for shutter that needs impulse instead of holding up/down relays. If set to 0 impulse shutter is disabled. Time is in ms. Default to 0
parameters.name: impulse_time

parameters.description: Time in sec for shutter to open or close
parameters.name: time

parameters.description: Internal graphical type for all calaos objects. Set automatically, read-only parameter.
parameters.name: gui_type

parameters.description: Unique ID identifying the Input/Output in calaos-server
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Name of Input/Output.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: If in impulse mode, some shutters needs to activate both up dans down relays when stopping the shutter
parameters.name: stop_both

parameters.description: Display the Input/Output on all user interfaces if set. Default to true
parameters.name: visible

parameters.description: Enable the Input/Output. The default value is true. This parameter is added if it's not found in the configuration.
parameters.name: enabled

conditions.description: Event when shutter is closed
conditions.name: false

conditions.description: Event when shutter is open
conditions.name: true

conditions.description: Event on any change of shutter state
conditions.name: changed

actions.description: Update internal shutter state without starting real action. This is useful when having updating the shutter state from an external source.
actions.name: set_state false

actions.description: Update internal shutter state without starting real action. This is useful when having updating the shutter state from an external source.
actions.name: set_state true

actions.description: Close shutter for X ms
actions.name: impulse down 200

actions.description: Open shutter for X ms
actions.name: impulse up 200

actions.description: Close the shutter
actions.name: down

actions.description: Open the shutter
actions.name: up

actions.description: Stop the shutter
actions.name: stop

actions.description: Invert shutter state
actions.name: toggle

GpioOutputShutterSmart.description: Smart shutter. This shutter calculates the position of the shutter based on the time it takes to open and close. It then allows to set directly the shutter at a specified position.

parameters.description: Impulse time for shutter that needs impulse instead of holding up/down relays. If set to 0 impulse shutter is disabled. Time is in ms. Default to 0
parameters.name: impulse_time

parameters.description: Time in sec for shutter to be fully open. The more accurate, the better it will work
parameters.name: time_up

parameters.description: Time in sec for shutter to fully closed. The more accurate, the better it will work
parameters.name: time_down

parameters.description: Internal graphical type for all calaos objects. Set automatically, read-only parameter.
parameters.name: gui_type

parameters.description: Unique ID identifying the Input/Output in calaos-server
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Name of Input/Output.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: If in impulse mode, some shutters needs to activate both up dans down relays when stopping the shutter
parameters.name: stop_both

parameters.description: Display the Input/Output on all user interfaces if set. Default to true
parameters.name: visible

parameters.description: Enable the Input/Output. The default value is true. This parameter is added if it's not found in the configuration.
parameters.name: enabled

conditions.description: Event when shutter is closed
conditions.name: false

conditions.description: Event when shutter is open
conditions.name: true

conditions.description: Event on any change of shutter state
conditions.name: changed

actions.description: Update internal shutter state without starting real action. This is useful when having updating the shutter state from an external source.
actions.name: set_state false

actions.description: Update internal shutter state without starting real action. This is useful when having updating the shutter state from an external source.
actions.name: set_state true

actions.description: Close the shutter by X percent
actions.name: down 5

actions.description: Stop the shutter
actions.name: stop

actions.description: Open the shutter
actions.name: up

actions.description: Set shutter at position X in percent
actions.name: set 50

actions.description: Close the shutter
actions.name: down

actions.description: Open shutter for X ms
actions.name: impulse up 200

actions.description: Invert shutter state
actions.name: toggle

actions.description: Close shutter for X ms
actions.name: impulse down 200

actions.description: Start calibration on shutter. This opens fully the shutter and resets all internal position values. Use this if shutter sync is lost.
actions.name: calibrate

actions.description: Open the shutter by X percent
actions.name: up 5

GpioOutputSwitch.description: Basic light. This light have only 2 states, ON or OFF. Can also be used to control simple relays output

parameters.description: Internal graphical type for all calaos objects. Set automatically, read-only parameter.
parameters.name: gui_type

parameters.description: Unique ID identifying the Input/Output in calaos-server
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Name of Input/Output.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Display the Input/Output on all user interfaces if set. Default to true
parameters.name: visible

parameters.description: Enable the Input/Output. The default value is true. This parameter is added if it's not found in the configuration.
parameters.name: enabled

conditions.description: Event when light is off
conditions.name: false

conditions.description: Event when light is on
conditions.name: true

conditions.description: Event on any change of value
conditions.name: changed

actions.description: Update internal light state without starting real action. This is useful when having updating the light state from an external source.
actions.name: set_state false

actions.description: Update internal light state without starting real action. This is useful when having updating the light state from an external source.
actions.name: set_state true

actions.description:
Do an impulse on light state with a pattern.
Ex: 500 200 500 200 means: TRUE for 500ms, FALSE for 200ms, TRUE for 500ms, FALSE for 200ms
Ex: 500 loop 200 300 means: TRUE for 500ms, then loop the next steps for infinite, FALSE for 200ms, TRUE for 300ms
Ex: 100 100 200 old means: blinks and then set to the old start state (before impulse starts)
actions.name: impulse 500 200 500 200

actions.description: Switch the light on
actions.name: true

actions.description: Switch the light off
actions.name: false

actions.description: Do an impulse on light state. Set to true for X ms then reset to false
actions.name: impulse 200

actions.description: Invert light state
actions.name: toggle

MySensorsOutputAnalog.description: Analog output with MySensors node Analog output. Useful to control analog output devices connected to calaos.

parameters.description: Internal graphical type for all calaos objects. Set automatically, read-only parameter.
parameters.name: gui_type

parameters.description: Unique ID identifying the Input/Output in calaos-server
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Sampling time in microsecond. The value is read at this frequency. If this value is not set, calaos tries to read the interval parameter
parameters.name: frequency

parameters.description: use in conjunction of coeff_b to apply equation of the form `value_displayed = coeff_a * raw_value + coeff_b`. Default value is 1.0.
parameters.name: coeff_a

parameters.description: Data type sent to the node. Default: V_DIMMER, see MySensors.cpp for more values.
parameters.name: data_type

parameters.description: Sensor ID, as set in your node
parameters.name: sensor_id

parameters.description: Node ID as set in your network
parameters.name: node_id

parameters.description: Set a step for increment/decrement value. Default is 1.0
parameters.name: step

parameters.description: Name of Input/Output.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Sampling time in seconds. The value is read at this frequency. If this value is not set, the default value is 15s
parameters.name: interval

parameters.description: use in conjunction of coeff_a to apply equation of the form `value_displayed = coeff_a * raw_value + coeff_b`. Default value is 0.0
parameters.name: coeff_b

parameters.description: Enable the Input/Output. The default value is true. This parameter is added if it's not found in the configuration.
parameters.name: enabled

parameters.description: Display the Input/Output on all user interfaces if set. Default to true
parameters.name: visible

parameters.description: same as coeff_b, can be used alone. Default value is 0.0
parameters.name: offset

conditions.description: Event on a specific number value
Event on any change of value
conditions.name: changed

conditions.description: Event on a specific value
conditions.name: value

actions.description: Decrement value by value
actions.name: dec 1

actions.description: Set a specific number value
Increment value with configured step
actions.name: inc

actions.description: Decrement value with configured step
actions.name: dec

actions.description: Increment value by value
actions.name: inc 1

Do an impulse on light state with a pattern.
Ex: 500 200 500 200 means: TRUE for 500ms, FALSE for 200ms, TRUE for 500ms, FALSE for 200ms

MySensorsOutputShutterSmart.description: Smart shutter with MySensors node Smart shutter. This shutter calculates the position of the shutter based on the time it takes to open and close. It then allows to set directly the shutter at a specified position.

parameters.description: Enable the Input/Output. The default value is true. This parameter is added if it's not found in the configuration.
parameters.name: enabled

parameters.description: Display the Input/Output on all user interfaces if set. Default to true
parameters.name: visible

parameters.description: If in impulse mode, some shutters needs to activate both up dans down relays when stopping the shutter
parameters.name: stop_both

parameters.description: Data type sent to the node. Default: V_LIGHT, see MySensors.cpp for more values.
parameters.name: data_type

parameters.description: Name of Input/Output.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Unique ID identifying the Input/Output in calaos-server
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Time in sec for shutter to fully closed. The more accurate, the better it will work
parameters.name: time_down

parameters.description: Node ID for closing shutter, as set in your network
parameters.name: node_id_down

parameters.description: Internal graphical type for all calaos objects. Set automatically, read-only parameter.
parameters.name: gui_type

parameters.description: Time in sec for shutter to be fully open. The more accurate, the better it will work
parameters.name: time_up

parameters.description: Node ID for opening shutter, as set in your network
parameters.name: node_id_up

parameters.description: Sensor ID for closing shutter, as set in your node
parameters.name: sensor_id_down

parameters.description: Sensor ID for opening shutter, as set in your node
parameters.name: sensor_id_up

parameters.description: Impulse time for shutter that needs impulse instead of holding up/down relays. If set to 0 impulse shutter is disabled. Time is in ms. Default to 0
parameters.name: impulse_time

conditions.description: Event when shutter is closed
conditions.name: false

conditions.description: Event when shutter is open
conditions.name: true

conditions.description: Event on any change of shutter state
conditions.name: changed

actions.name: set_state false

actions.description: Update internal shutter state without starting real action. This is useful when having updating the shutter state from an external source.
actions.name: set_state true

actions.name: down 5

actions.name: stop

actions.name: up

actions.name: set 50

actions.name: down

actions.description: Open shutter for X ms
actions.name: impulse up 200

actions.description: Invert shutter state
actions.name: toggle

actions.description: Close shutter for X ms

OLAOutputLightDimmer.description: DMX Light dimmer using OLA (Open Lighting Architecture) Light with dimming control. Light intensity can be changed for this light.

parameters.description: Internal graphical type for all calaos objects. Set automatically, read-only parameter.
parameters.name: gui_type

parameters.description: Unique ID identifying the Input/Output in calaos-server
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: DMX channel to control
parameters.name: channel

parameters.description: OLA universe to control
parameters.name: universe

parameters.description: Name of Input/Output.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Display the Input/Output on all user interfaces if set. Default to true
parameters.name: visible

parameters.description: Enable the Input/Output. The default value is true. This parameter is added if it's not found in the configuration.
parameters.name: enabled

conditions.description: Event when light is at this value
conditions.name: value

conditions.description: Event on any change of value
conditions.name: changed

actions.description: Dynamically change light intensity when holding a switch (press action)
actions.name: hold press

actions.description: Increase intensity by X percent
actions.name: up 5

actions.description: Invert the light state
actions.name: toggle

actions.description: Do an impulse on light state. Set to true for X ms then reset to false
actions.name: impulse 200

actions.description: Dynamically change light intensity when holding a switch (stop action)
actions.name: hold stop

actions.description: Switch the light off
actions.name: false

actions.description: Switch the light on
actions.name: true

actions.description: Set light intensity and swith on if light is off
actions.name: set 50

actions.description: Update internal light state without starting real action. This is useful when having updating the light state from an external source.
actions.name: set_state 50

actions.description: Decrease intensity by X percent
actions.name: down 5

actions.description:
Do an impulse on light state with a pattern.
Ex: 500 200 500 200 means: TRUE for 500ms, FALSE for 200ms, TRUE for 500ms, FALSE for 200ms
Ex: 500 loop 200 300 means: TRUE for 500ms, then loop the next steps for infinite, FALSE for 200ms, TRUE for 300ms
Ex: 100 100 200 old means: blinks and then set to the old start state (before impulse starts)
actions.name: impulse 500 200 500 200

actions.description: Update internal light state without starting real action. This is useful when having updating the light state from an external source.
actions.name: set_state true

actions.description: Update internal light state without starting real action. This is useful when having updating the light state from an external source.
actions.name: set_state false

actions.description: Set light value without switching on. This will be the light intensity for the next ON
actions.name: set off 50

parameters.description: Sampling time in microsecond. The value is read at this frequency. If this value is not set, calaos tries to read the interval parameter

parameters.description: use in conjunction of coeff_b to apply equation of the form `value_displayed = coeff_a * raw_value + coeff_b`. Default value is 1.0.

parameters.description: Set a step for increment/decrement value. Default is 1.0
parameters.name: step

parameters.description: Name of Input/Output.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Sampling time in seconds. The value is read at this frequency. If this value is not set, the default value is 15s
parameters.name: interval

parameters.description: use in conjunction of coeff_a to apply equation of the form `value_displayed = coeff_a * raw_value + coeff_b`. Default value is 0.0
parameters.name: coeff_b

parameters.name: port

parameters.name: enabled

parameters.description: Display the Input/Output on all user interfaces if set. Default to true
parameters.name: visible

parameters.description: same as coeff_b, can be used alone. Default value is 0.0
parameters.name: offset

WOVolet.description: Simple shutter using wago digital output modules (like 750-1504, ...) Simple shutter. This shutter supports open/close states, as well as impulse shutters.

parameters.description: Impulse time for shutter that needs impulse instead of holding up/down relays. If set to 0 impulse shutter is disabled. Time is in ms. Default to 0

WOVoletSmart.description: Smart shutter using wago digital output modules (like 750-1504, ...) Smart shutter. This shutter calculates the position of the shutter based on the time it takes to open and close. It then allows to set directly the shutter at a specified position.

parameters.description: Set to true if output is a KNX device (only for 750-849 with KNX/TP1 module)
parameters.name: knx

parameters.description: Should be false if PLC is 750-842, true otherwise
parameters.name: wago_841

parameters.description: Digital output address on the PLC for opening the shutter
parameters.name: var_up

parameters.description: Wago PLC IP address on the network
parameters.name: host

parameters.description: Wago ethernet port, default to 502
parameters.name: port

parameters.description: Enable the Input/Output. The default value is true. This parameter is added if it's not found in the configuration.
parameters.name: enabled

parameters.description: Display the Input/Output on all user interfaces if set. Default to true
parameters.name: visible

parameters.description: If in impulse mode, some shutters needs to activate both up dans down relays when stopping the shutter

X10Output.description: Light dimmer using X10 and heyu. Light with dimming control. Light intensity can be changed for this light.

parameters.description: House code of the X10 light device
parameters.name: code

parameters.description: Internal graphical type for all calaos objects. Set automatically, read-only parameter.
parameters.name: gui_type

parameters.description: Unique ID identifying the Input/Output in calaos-server
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Name of Input/Output.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Display the Input/Output on all user interfaces if set. Default to true
parameters.name: visible

parameters.description: Enable the Input/Output. The default value is true. This parameter is added if it's not found in the configuration.
parameters.name: enabled

conditions.description: Event when light is at this value
conditions.name: value

conditions.description: Event on any change of value
conditions.name: changed

actions.description: Dynamically change light intensity when holding a switch (press action)
actions.name: hold press

actions.description: Increase intensity by X percent
actions.name: up 5

actions.description: Invert the light state
actions.name: toggle

actions.description: Do an impulse on light state. Set to true for X ms then reset to false
actions.name: impulse 200

actions.description: Dynamically change light intensity when holding a switch (stop action)
actions.name: hold stop

actions.description: Switch the light off
actions.name: false

actions.description: Switch the light on
actions.name: true

actions.description: Set light intensity and swith on if light is off
actions.name: set 50

actions.description: Update internal light state without starting real action. This is useful when having updating the light state from an external source.
actions.name: set_state 50

actions.description: Decrease intensity by X percent
actions.name: down 5

actions.description:
Do an impulse on light state with a pattern.
Ex: 500 200 500 200 means: TRUE for 500ms, FALSE for 200ms, TRUE for 500ms, FALSE for 200ms
Ex: 500 loop 200 300 means: TRUE for 500ms, then loop the next steps for infinite, FALSE for 200ms, TRUE for 300ms
Ex: 100 100 200 old means: blinks and then set to the old start state (before impulse starts)
actions.name: impulse 500 200 500 200

actions.description: Update internal light state without starting real action. This is useful when having updating the light state from an external source.
actions.name: set_state true

actions.description: Update internal light state without starting real action. This is useful when having updating the light state from an external source.
actions.name: set_state false

actions.description: Set light value without switching on. This will be the light intensity for the next ON
actions.name: set off 50
